sentences.english: He is a very good husband and never runs around on his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他是個模範丈夫，從來不會瞞着妻子做一切事情。

sentences.english: Indeed, anything untoward was now kept from James.
sentences.chinese: 的確，現在一切不順心的事都小心瞞著詹姆士。

sentences.english: Lucy had done that morning, but she palmed him off with some story or other.
sentences.chinese: 求道露西那幹些什，她套假話把瞞去。

sentences.english: I knew I would eventually have to tell him.
sentences.chinese: 我心裏清楚，瞞不了的，總有一天要告訴他。

sentences.english: The next day, he went to the bar without letting his colleague know.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，他瞞着同事悄悄來到了那個酒吧。

sentences.english: The situation of affairs in the Longbourn family could not be long a secret.

sentences.english: My intuition told me that he had covered something to me.

sentences.english: Brother to work honestly, deceiving his wife often living on sisters relief.

sentences.english: I thought I could conceal the lives of people still can not escape their own camouflage heart.

sentences.english: That he overburnt to me implied he had something hidden from me.
